entry.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - Migration CLUSTER to CLUSTER
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 15, 2025, 21:00 UTC  -  Feb 17, 2026, 22:00 UTC

Dec 6, 00:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VoIP offer.

Start time : 15/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/02/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers will experience a 10 minute down during maintenance.
Service improvement : We need to upgrade the firmware on our Yealink phones. We need to realize 2 upgrade to install the good version of the firmware, except for the CP860 model where only 1 upgrade is enough. The maintenance campain will take several days at the same timeslot every day from 21:00 UTC to 22:00 UTC.
The planning for each model is as follows :

Yealink CP860 :
Single update date :15/12/2025

Yealink CP920 :
First update date :14/01/2025
Second update date :15/01/2025

Yealink T41P :
First update date :19/01/2025
Second update date :20/01/2025

Yealink T41S :
First update date :21/01/2025
Second update date :22/01/2025

Yealink T46G :
First update date :26/01/2025
Second update date :27/01/2025

Yealink T46S :
First update date :28/01/2025
Second update date :29/01/2025

Yealink T53 :
First update date :02/02/2025
Second update date :03/02/2025

Yealink T53W :
First update date :04/02/2025
Second update date :05/02/2025

Yealink W56P :
First update date :09/02/2025
Second update date :10/02/2025

Yealink W60P & W53P :
First update date :11/02/2025
Second update date :12/02/2025

For Enterprise and Business customer, all models concerned :
First update date :16/02/2025
Second update date :17/02/2025

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 9, 2025, 18:00 UTC  -  May 10, 2026, 20:00 UTC

Nov 21, 09:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer.

Start time : 09/12/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 31/05/2026 09:44 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours
Affected customers will receive several emails notifying them of the maintenance day.
During this period, emails received will be delivered after the short interruption.

Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail.
No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - Zimbra maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 8, 20:00 - 21:00 UTC

Dec 6, 00:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Collaborative solutions offer.

Start time : 08/12/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 08/12/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, The Zimbra SSL certificate will be renewed.
A service reload is required during this process, which will briefly interrupt existing connections for less than five minutes while all services are restarted.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Zimbra Collaborative solutions offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA2][Collaborative solutions] - Filerz164 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 6, 06:48 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions has been resolved.

Start time : 06/12/2025 05:23 UTC
End time : 06/12/2025 06:45 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 6, 05:52 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Collaborative solutions offer on the specific GRA 2 region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 06/12/2025 05:23 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The MX Plan service is temporarily unavailable on File server 164.
Customers Impact : Some customers are currently experiencing temporary disruptions accessing webmail through both the web interface and desktop clients. Sent and received emails are temporarily unavailable but will be delivered once the incident is resolved.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - OVH Mail Migrator maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 26, 01:42 UTC
Completed - We would like to inform you that the maintenance on our Web Hosting offer is now completed.
All services are operational.

Thank you for your patience throughout this maintenance.

Nov 24, 07:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 18, 23:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of a complete overhaul of our interface and a user experience enhancement, a new website and a new API called v3 will be available.

Start time : 24/11/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 26/11/2025 18:30 UTC
Service impact : OVH Mail Migrator API and UI.
Service improvement : During the update, the current website will be in maintenance mode. When the new website and API are released, the previous website will be in read only for 2 months to let you access your previous migrations.

You will be invited to go to the new website at https://omm.ovhcloud.com to create new migrations.

The new API v3 replaces the old one, and you'll need to use it to create new migrations, projects, or file uploads. It will be available at https://api.omm.ovhcloud.com/swagger.

Thank you for your understanding
